channel.title: [PI] Error, ScriptManager
channel.description:
So, when I compile everything is fine and dandy. BUT, when I run the server it loads fine then right at the end I get this...
[code][4/12/11 9:40 PM]: Launching InProgresse [4/12/11 9:40 PM]: Loading scripts... .\Data\scripts\player\eat\eat.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player\items\spade.pypt: .\Data\scripts\player
pc
pc1.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player
pc
pc2.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player
pc
pc3.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player\objects\objectclick1.py .\Data\scripts\player\objects\objectclick2.py .\Data\scripts\player\objects\objectclick3.py .\Data\scripts\player\skills\herblore.py .\Data\scripts\player\skills\mining.py [4/12/11 9:40 PM]: Exception in thread "main" Traceback (innermost last): File "<iostream>", line 4, in ? ImportError: no module named random Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I''m assuming it has to with a file named Random.

item.title: [PI] Error, ScriptManager
item.dc:creator: @kriskuhar kriskuhar
item.description:
@kriskuhar wrote:

So, when I compile everything is fine and dandy. BUT, when I run the server it loads fine then right at the end I get this…

[4/12/11 9:40 PM]: Launching InProgresse [4/12/11 9:40 PM]: Loading scripts... .\Data\scripts\player\eat\eat.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player\items\spade.pypt: .\Data\scripts\player\npc\npc1.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player\npc\npc2.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player\npc\npc3.pyscript: .\Data\scripts\player\objects\objectclick1.py .\Data\scripts\player\objects\objectclick2.py .\Data\scripts\player\objects\objectclick3.py .\Data\scripts\player\skills\herblore.py .\Data\scripts\player\skills\mining.py [4/12/11 9:40 PM]: Exception in thread "main" Traceback (innermost last): File "<iostream>", line 4, in ? ImportError: no module named random Press any key to continue . . .

I’'m assuming it has to with a file named Random.

Read full topic
